thread.title: The Business Bank of St. Louis Welcomes Two Members to the Associate Board
thread.title_full: The Business Bank of St. Louis Welcomes Two Members to the Associate Board - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: The Business Bank of St. Louis Welcomes Two Members to the Associate Board
text:
The Business Bank of St. Louis Welcomes Two Members to the Associate Board
St. Louis bank adds to board.
St. Louis, MO, September 02, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Business Bank of St. Louis recently added A.J. Eads and Aron Clay to its Associate Board of Directors.
Eads is the owner of Eads Consulting, a marketing firm specializing in strategy and digital executions. He is a graduate of John Burroughs School in St. Louis and received a Bachelor’s Degree in Sports Marketing from the University of Indianapolis.
Clay is the owner and President of Acme Erectors, Inc., St. Louis’ largest steel erection subcontractor. He has a Bachelor’s of Science in Construction Engineering and Management from Purdue University and a Master’s of Business Administration from St. Louis University.
The Business Bank was founded in 2002 and operates a full-service banking facility from its single location at 8000 Maryland Ave. in Clayton, Mo. The bank’s mission is to be the leading financial partner for successful St. Louis area businesses, entrepreneurs and individuals requiring customized financial solutions. For more information, call Brian Leeker at (314) 721-8003.
